abstract: Rupert Murdoch went out of his way to praise the show that replaced Glenn Beck at 5 P.M. And though the channel and its former star were supposed to work together in the future, so far they haven’t.
snippet: Rupert Murdoch went out of his way to praise the show that replaced Glenn Beck at 5 P.M. And though the channel and its former star were supposed to work together in the future, so far they haven’t.
lead_paragraph: A Twitter message from Rupert Murdoch about the Fox News talk show “The Five” drew notice on Monday.

headline.main: Murdoch Tweet Hints at Chill Between Fox News and Glenn Beck
